cam.find: Find more QR codes in the park and scan them
modal.0: Only a little time? Then take advantage of our highlight tour to explore the All Elelectric Society Park. The tour lasts approx. 30 min.
modal.1: My points of contact with the All Electric Society? This tour shows examples from our everyday life about this. The tour lasts approx. 45 min.
modal.2: What does the All Electric Society have to do with transportation infrastructure? This tour gives an insight into this in approx. 45 min.
modal.3: This tour provides a comprehensive view of the All Electric Society. In about 90 minutes, the entire All Electric Society Park is explored.
modal.4: Interested in optimizations and energy savings? This tour shows in approx. 1h examples from the All Electric Society about this.
modal.5: The basis in the All Electric Society is renewable energy. In about 45 min. this tour shows examples of application.
